name: Avoid passing the variables of a function by reference(PHP)
description: This rule searches all the Methods and Functions having parameters passed by value  when these parameters are only used in read mode.
output:
This report lists all the Methods, Functions and PHP Sections having parameters passed by value  when these parameters are only used in read mode.

Methods, Functions and PHP Sections full name.
rationale: Most of the times the functions only need to use the values from their parameters without changing them. In such cases, you can safely pass those parameters by reference (e.g., function(&$parameter) rather than  value (e.g function($parameter)) and avoid having to make memory-intensive copies and therefore increase the performance of the application.
remediation: try and passe the parameters by reference  when these parameters are only used in read mode.
